articles.title: Microsoft wants to kill reply all emails with new Office 365 feature - Business Insider - Business Insider
articles.description: Microsoft Office 365 will now block reply all messages on massive email threads, the company recently announced.
articles.content:
Microsoft is hoping to put an end to those massive reply-all email threads clogging your inbox.
The company is rolling out a new feature for Office 365 geared toward large, company-wide emails that will block responses on messages sent to large distribution … [+1636 chars]
